Text: *astonished gasp*
Aaaaaah!!!
Tell me—
Hm?
Aaaaah!!!
Are the two of you okay?
Would you mind getting off me, Rose?
Princess Alexia, please watch where you're touching.
As if I'd ever want to feel those flabby sacks.
Oh, jealous, are we?

Rose feels a bit dejected seeing them get along so
poorly.
Please don't fight, you two.

As Rose straightens up, she realizes they are being
watched.
Um... Well.

No sooner has Rose decided that she needs to do
something than Alexia shoots up forecefully.
Sorry.

We tripped and fell, and the door just happened to be
right there in front of us.

Rose learned that the art of persuasion is born from
a confident demeanor.

Carry yourself with the nerve of a demon lord who's
conquered the world, and no one will bother calling
out even your most bald-faced lies.

Everyone regards Alexia with looks that say, "Okay,
sure, if that's how you want to put it."

Do as you please. You probably have a right to know a
few things as well.
Huh?
*sigh*
Is this the Sanctuary?

It’s said that after severing it, the great hero Olivier
sealed away the left arm of Diablos the demon here.

And what of it? Have you come searching for this fabled
arm?

As fun as that sounds...it's knowledge of the Cult of
Diablos that interests us.

Alexia looks startled at mention of the Cult. From
the corner of her eye, Rose can see the other
princess's gaze harden.
What do you mean...?

I know that you can't answer. So we had to come see
for ourselves.

In search of the truth—concealed from the very
beginning within the shadows of history.
A statue of the great hero Olivier, I see.
Rose cocks her head curiously at Alpha's statement.
Olivier...? But isn't the hero a man?

The statue Alpha indicates to be the hero is of a
woman holding a sacred sword. She is beautiful,
with the fierce divinity of a Valkyrie.

We have a general understanding. However, the
historical truths, the Cult's true goal...
...why Olivier's face is identical to mine.

Everyone gasps at her beauty as they realize she is
right. Alpha's features are a carbon copy of Olivier's.

You're that possessed elf...! But you should have
died from the incompatibility...!
So you do know something!

We know the truth about the possessed too. For a cult
that wants to control society, that must be quite the
thorn in your side, no?

Rose can't make heads or tails of anything they are
saying. However, Alexia looks like she understands
at least some of it, not to mention that Alpha doesn't
seem like someone who spouts nonsense.

Organizations with this much power probably aren't
engaging in archaeology just for fun. There has to
be some important reason

The Shadow Garden must have an agenda, and the Cult
of Diablos as well.

The recent attack on the Academy crosses Rose's mind.
That incident has to be related to all of this somehow.

Two massive powers are locked in a war in the shadows.
The realization makes Rose tremble in fear.

She can not possibly imagine a kingdom that knows
nothing of it all being equipped to deal with their
conflict, should it ever escalate.

We had our suspicions that the Cult's objective isn't
simply to revive the demon, but we weren't certain.
So we came to see for ourselves.
As she speaks, Alpha channels magic into the statue.

A great battle was once fought here, and many lives
were lost.
The buildup of magic causes the air to waver.

Such a quantity of magic sends a chill up Rose's
spine. If this woman ever turned her ire toward the
kingdom, it would require a massive expenditure
of military might to stop her.

Such magic can only come from one of the possessed.
But did you awaken it on your own...?
Impossible...! Why is it activating?

The demon’s and warriors’ magic twisted together,
trapping all of the memories that had lost their
destinations.

This is the resting place of those ancient memories
and that demon’s wrath. A graveyard.
No... This can't be...
Olivier?!
Now, let's be off to the world of fairy tales.

Alpha's voice is the last thing they hear in this
radiant world.
